channel.title: CVE Feed for endortrails -- Sell Media
channel.description: The latest CVEs for endortrails -- Sell Media

item.title: CVE-2021-4420|2024-10-22T18:52:37.166Z -- endortrails -- sell%20media
item.description: The Sell Media plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.5.5. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the sell_media_process() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to sell media paypal orders via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
